Public Class methods
new(view_context, options, block)

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 219
219:       def initialize(view_context, options, block)
220:         @view           = view_context
221:         @partial_names  = PARTIAL_NAMES[@view.controller.class.name]
222: 
223:         setup(options, block)
224:       end
Public Instance methods
collection_with_template(template = @template)

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 284
284:       def collection_with_template(template = @template)
285:         segments, locals, template = [], @locals, @template
286: 
287:         if @options[:as]
288:           as = @options[:as]
289:           counter = "#{as}_counter".to_sym
290:         else
291:           as = template.variable_name
292:           counter = template.counter_name
293:         end
294: 
295:         locals[counter] = 1
296: 
297:         @collection.each do |object|
298:           locals[counter] += 1
299:           locals[as] = object
300:           segments << template.render(@view, locals)
301:         end
302: 
303:         segments
304:       end
collection_without_template(collection_paths = @collection_paths)

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 306
306:       def collection_without_template(collection_paths = @collection_paths)
307:         segments, locals = [], @locals
308:         index, template  = 1, nil
309: 
310:         if @options[:as]
311:           as = @options[:as]
312:           counter = "#{as}_counter"
313:         end
314: 
315:         @collection.each_with_index do |object, i|
316:           template = find_template(collection_paths[i])
317:           locals[as || template.variable_name] = object
318:           locals[counter || template.counter_name] = (index += 1)
319: 
320:           segments << template.render(@view, locals)
321:         end
322: 
323:         @template = template
324:         segments
325:       end
render()

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 249
249:       def render
250:         identifier = ((@template = find_template) ? @template.identifier : @path)
251: 
252:         if @collection
253:           ActiveSupport::Notifications.instrument("render_collection.action_view",
254:             :identifier => identifier || "collection", :count => @collection.size) do
255:             render_collection
256:           end
257:         else
258:           block, options, locals = @block, @options, @locals
259: 
260:           content = ActiveSupport::Notifications.instrument("render_partial.action_view",
261:             :identifier => identifier) do
262:             render_partial
263:           end
264: 
265:           if !block && (layout = options[:layout])
266:             content = @view._render_layout(find_template(layout), locals){ content }
267:           end
268: 
269:           content
270:         end
271:       end
render_collection()

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 273
273:       def render_collection
274:         return nil if @collection.blank?
275: 
276:         if @options.key?(:spacer_template)
277:           spacer = find_template(@options[:spacer_template]).render(@view, @locals)
278:         end
279: 
280:         result = @template ? collection_with_template : collection_without_template
281:         result.join(spacer).html_safe
282:       end
render_partial(object = @object)

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 327
327:       def render_partial(object = @object)
328:         locals, view, template, block = @locals, @view, @template, @block
329: 
330:         object ||= locals[template.variable_name]
331:         locals[@options[:as] || template.variable_name] = object
332: 
333:         template.render(view, locals) do |*name|
334:           view._layout_for(*name, &block)
335:         end
336:       end
setup(options, block)

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 226
226:       def setup(options, block)
227:         partial = options[:partial]
228: 
229:         @options = options
230:         @locals  = options[:locals] || {}
231:         @block   = block
232: 
233:         if String === partial
234:           @object     = options[:object]
235:           @path       = partial
236:           @collection = collection
237:         else
238:           @object = partial
239: 
240:           if @collection = collection_from_object || collection
241:             paths = @collection_paths = @collection.map { |o| partial_path(o) }
242:             @path = paths.uniq.size == 1 ? paths.first : nil
243:           else
244:             @path = partial_path
245:           end
246:         end
247:       end
Private Instance methods
collection()

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 340
340:       def collection
341:         if @options.key?(:collection)
342:           collection = @options[:collection]
343:           collection.respond_to?(:to_ary) ? collection.to_ary : []
344:         end
345:       end
collection_from_object()

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 347
347:       def collection_from_object
348:         if @object.respond_to?(:to_ary)
349:           @object.to_ary
350:         end
351:       end
find_template(path=@path)

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 353
353:       def find_template(path=@path)
354:         return path unless path.is_a?(String)
355:         prefix = @view.controller_path unless path.include?(//)
356:         @view.find_template(path, prefix, true)
357:       end
partial_path(object = @object)

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_view/render/partials.rb, line 359
359:       def partial_path(object = @object)
360:         @partial_names[object.class.name] ||= begin
361:           object = object.to_model if object.respond_to?(:to_model)
362: 
363:           object.class.model_name.partial_path.dup.tap do |partial|
364:             path = @view.controller_path
365:             partial.insert(0, "#{File.dirname(path)}/") if partial.include?(//) && path.include?(//)
366:           end
367:         end
368:       end
